author: Epic Games
description:
Get an exclusive Black and Gold skin for Remi and his drone for free when you purchase Hell is Us on the Epic Games Store! https://epic.gm/hell-is-us
—
Trust your senses, ready your blade.
Hell is Us is an action-adventure game that brings fresh ideas to the genre. From organic exploration and investigation to intense melee combat, it gives back players the freedom to uncover its story on their own.
There's no map, no quest markers, and no magical compass. Without those artificial aids, it relies on organic exploration. You will have to trust your senses and follow your instincts, guided by the characters and the world around you.
Begin your adventure today if you pre-purchase the Deluxe Edition. Full release on the Epic Games Store on September 4, 2025.
title: Hell is Us in 90 seconds | Epic Games Store
